definitions.definition: A lord, master, or other person in authority, most commonly used vocatively: formerly in speaking to elders and superiors, later only when addressing a sovereign.
A male animal; a stud, especially a horse or dog, that has fathered another.
A father; the head of a family; the husband.
A creator; a maker; an author; an originator.
(of a male) to procreate; to father, beget, impregnate.
